remarks: The predicate "is a poset."  (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2012.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Nov-2013.)
statement:
ispos.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
ispos.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
ispos $p |- ( K e. Poset <-> ( K e. _V /\ A. x e. B A. y e. B A. z e. B ( x .<_ x /\ ( ( x .<_ y /\ y .<_ x ) -> x = y ) /\ ( ( x .<_ y /\ y .<_ z ) -> x .<_ z ) ) ) ) $.
$d .<_ x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
